mapper.select: select * from (select fno as "number", f_title as "title", f_regdate as "regdate" from tbl_free where nickname= #{nickname} union select rno as "number", r_title as "title", r_regdate as "regdate" from tbl_recipe where nickname= #{nickname} union select gbno as "number", gb_title as "title", gb_regdate as "regdate" from tbl_group_board where nickname= #{nickname} union select uno as "number", ur_title as "title", ur_regdate as "regdate" from tbl_userroutine where nickname= #{nickname} order by "regdate" desc) where rownum <= 5
select g.gno, g_name, g_attend, g_present, g_leader, u.userid, u.u_pic from tbl_group g, tbl_group_join j, tbl_user u where j.userid = u.userid and g.gno = j.gno order by g_name
select gno from tbl_group_join where nickname = #{nickname}
select nickname from tbl_group_join where gno = #{gno}
